data.text:
150+ Best Instagram Bios For Musicians [2024]

If you're looking to up your Instagram game, it's imperative that you have a great Instagram bio.

Your Instagram bio is the first thing your followers will see - it should be unique and tell users exactly what you do and who you are.

We understand how difficult it can be to craft a compelling Instagram bio, which is why we curated a list of the best musician Instagram bios.

Additionally, we provide you with examples of the best musician bios on Instagram and a step-by-step guide to get you started.

Looking to generate your own bio? Check out our free Instagram bio generator here.

Creative Instagram Bios For Musicians

Music is life. That’s why our hearts have beats.

Music touches us emotionally, where words alone can’t. ― Johnny Depp

Sometimes music makes us realize how much we love that person.

We will rock you.

Virtually every writer I know would rather be a musician.― Kurt Vonnegut

Where words fail, music speaks. ― Hans Christian Andersen

People haven’t always been there for me but music always has.

Music is my Life & Lyrics are my Stories.

Sometimes music makes us realize how much we love that person.

With night Music, you either forget everything, or you remember everything.

Music is the only way to run without leaving home.

Peopled at once.― Robert Browning

Without music, life would be a mistake ― Friedrich Nietzsche

Sometimes it feels like music is my only friend.

You can’t overdose on music.

Let it all out.

Dear Music, I will never be able to thank you enough for always being there for me.

You have to take a deep breath. And allow the music to flow through you. Revel in it, allow yourself to awe. When you play, allow the music to break your heart with its beauty.― Kelly White

Your heart is just a beatbox for the song of your life.

Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and life to everything.― Plato

Music once admitted to the soul, becomes a sort of spirit, and never dies. ― Edward Bulwer-Lytton

I can chase you, and I can catch you, but there is nothing I can do to make you mine.― Morrissey

Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and life to everything. ― Plato

When you make music or write or create, it’s your job to have mind-blowing, irresponsible, condomless sex with whatever idea it is you’re writing about at the time. ― Lady Gaga

Music is the moonlight in the gloomy night of life. ― Jean-Paul Friedrich Richter

I see my life in terms of music. ― Albert Einstein

You drive us wild, we’ll drive you crazy” – Kiss, Rock n Roll All Night

Music is the language of feelings.

My room is alive with the sound of music.

Music is the universal language of mankind.

Music once admitted to the soul, becomes a sort of spirit, and never dies.― Edward Bulwer-Lytton

One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.― Bob Marley

Music is an agreeable harmony for the honor of God and the permissible delights of the soul.― Johann Sebastian Bach

Turn up the love.

If I cannot fly, let me sing. ― Stephen Sondheim

Music speaks what cannot be expressed soothes the mind and gives it rest heals the heart and makes it whole flows from heaven to the soul.

Music is heard in every work of art.

Restarting the Whole Song Because U Missed Your Favorite Line.

Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.

All it takes is one song to bring back 1000 memories.

I want to meet someone who makes me feel the way music does.

One good thing about music is when it hits you, you feel no pain.

Music and sleep are the two most common ways to escape from everything.

Life is like a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up. ― Hans Christian Andersen

I’m just feelin’ my vibe right now. I’m feelin’ myself.” – Desiigner, “Panda”

Life is short. Buy the damn concert tickets.

When I listen to old songs, the memories hit me.

The real trouble with reality is that there’s no background music.

You can’t download a live musical experience.

Music is my escape.

Music is like a dream. One that I cannot hear.― Ludwig van Beethoven

Music is a piece of art that goes in the ears straight to the heart.

Music Is My Painkiller.

Don’t interrupt me when I’m listening to my music.

We drift deeper into the sound.

One good thing about music – when it hits you, you feel no pain.

I can’t go a day without listening to music!

The earth has music for those who listen.

Listening to music helps keeps minds active and memories alive.

Behind every favorite song, there is an untold story.

I think music in itself is healing. It’s an explosive expression of humanity. It’s something we are all touched by. No matter what culture we’re from, everyone loves music. ― Billy Joel

Music is a language that doesn’t speak in particular words. It speaks in emotions. – Keith Richards

Music . . . Can name the unnameable and communicate the unknowable.― Leonard Bernstein

Music is the language of feelings.

The power of a love song, it can change everything

I like my music’s volume high enough to not hear you.

I can’t go a day without listening to music!

I’m tuned in to a tune.

One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain. ― Bob Marley

Sometimes music is the only medicine the heart and soul need.

Music can change the world because it can change people.

Music touches us emotionally, where words alone can’t.― Johnny Depp

Music is the strongest form of magic. ― Marilyn Manson

When you’re happy, You enjoy the music. When you’re sad, You understand the lyrics.

How is it that music can, without words, evoke our laughter, our fears, our highest aspirations? ― Jane Swan

Music is my divinity and the only love that has never left me.

Listening to music gives me a higher power.

Sing with me, sing for the year, sing for the laughter, and sing it for the tear.” – Aerosmith “Dream On”

Unique Instagram Bios For Musicians

It’s crazy how music can connect souls.

A Music is to the soul what words are to the mind. ― Modest Mouse

Music of all the arts, stands in a particular region, unlit by any star but its own, and utterly without meaning… except its own.

Why be moody when you can shake yo booty?

Melody is the thought, the movement, and the soul of music.

I wish you’d listen closer to the songs I play. Because the lyrics speak the words, I fail to say.

Long live rock n’ roll.

MP3ing it.

Music can impact the ethical side of the soul. And again the music has such properties that it should be included in the education process of youth.

Music knows more about the kind of mood I’m in than I do.

Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent.

Feeling the bass pounding in your chest.

Music is a proud, temperamental mistress. Give her the time and attention she deserves, and she is yours. Slight her, and there will come a day when you call, and she will not answer. So I began sleeping less to give her the time she needed.― Patrick Rothfuss

No matter what you’re going through, no matter how you feel, music always helps.

Where words leave off, music begins.

The only truth is music. ― Jack Kerouac

The time I feel most alive is when I listen to music.

The more you love, the more love you have to give. It’s the only feeling we have which is infinite…― Christina Westover

Music produces a kind of pleasure, which human nature cannot do without. ― Confucius

If it’s illegal to rock n’ roll, throw my ass in jail.

I just want someone who will take me to a concert instead of a fancy dinner.

I hate it when I have to Pause my Music every time someone talks to me.

No matter where life takes me, find me with a smile – Mac Miler

Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence. ― Robert Fripp

A painter paints pictures on canvas. But musicians paint their pictures on silence.― Leopold Stokowski

Funny Instagram Bios For Musicians

I like beautiful melodies telling me terrible things.― Tom Waits

The universe can hear music in the soul.

Music is a language that doesn’t speak in particular words. It speaks in emotions, and if it’s in the bones, it’s in the bones. ― Keith Richards

In the end, Music is my only friend; in endless nights.

People ask me how I make music. I tell them I step into it. It’s like stepping into a river and joining the flow. Every moment in the river has its song.― Michael Jackson

I’m the type of person who will pretend I can’t hear you when I have my earphones on.

Pandora has taught me that a lot of the music I love is very similar to music I hate.

If I were not a physicist, I would probably be a musician. I often think of music. Also, live my daydreams in music. I see my life in terms of music. ― Albert Einstein

I fly with the stars in the skies – Nicki Minaj

Music unites the moral, emotional, and aesthetic spheres of man.

Music is my best friend.

All it takes is one song to bring back a thousand memories.

People are like ‘Music’ some say the ‘Truth’ and rest, just noise.

Sometimes I need to be alone with my music.

When you’re happy, you enjoy the music… But, when you’re sad, you understand the lyrics.

Without music, life would be a blank to me.

I’m sorry, I can’t hear you, my stereo is on full blast.

It’s like if the music is loud enough I won’t be able to listen to my own thoughts. ― Nic Sheff

Someone once asked me: Why do you love music so much? I replied: Because it’s the only thing that stays when everything and everyone is gone.

Exist loudly.

When I ask you to listen to a song, it’s because the lyrics mean everything I’m trying to say to you.

The beauty of music is in its simplicity and naturalness.

Can’t hear you! Listening to music!

Lose yourself in the Music.

If being an egomaniac means I believe in what I do and in my art or music, then in that respect you can call me that… I believe in what I do, and I’ll say it.” ― John Lennon

There's nothing like a great song to get me in the mood.

I can't imagine my life without music.

I'm a music lover, and I'm not afraid to show it!

Musician who loves to post pictures of themselves with their instrument.

Music lover who likes to share music-related quotes on Instagram.

I sing because it sets me free.

Music is the universal language of the soul.

Sing like there's no one listening, love like you'll never be hurt, dance like nobody's watching, and live like it's heaven on earth.

Singer. Songwriter. Coffee Lover.

Singing is my passion and coffee is my love.

I'm a singer and a coffee addict.

I love singing and I love coffee even more.

Singer and coffee lover extraordinaire.

I'm a singer, not a celebrity.

Singing is my passion and I love it more than anything.

My music is my life and I would be nothing without it.

I'm just a girl who loves to sing.

I may not be famous yet, but I'm working hard for it.

Singing is my escape from the world and its problems.

I want to make my music heard by as many people as possible.

Instagram bio for singer girl

I'm a singer girl and I love it.

I'm not just a singer girl, I'm an artist.

Singing is my passion and I live for it.

Singing is my life and I wouldn't have it any other way."1. "I'm a singer, not a songwriter.

I live my life one day at a time and I hope to make it count.

I'm a singer girl.

I'm the girl who sings.

I'm the girl who loves to sing.

I'm not a regular singer, I'm a cool singer.

I'm not a singer, I'm a musician. -I'm not a boy, I'm a man.

I'm not a singer, I'm a storyteller.

I'm not here to entertain you, I'm here to inspire you.

I'm not just a singer, I'm an artist.

Music bio for Instagram you can copy and paste

I'm a music lover, plain and simple.

Music is my lifeblood.

Without music, I'd be lost.

I love all kinds of music, from rock to classical to country.

I'm always looking for new music to listen to.

If I can't find peace in music, then I can't find it anywhere.

Short Bio for Music Lover

Music is my love, voice my passion.

Music is a universal language. You don't have to be fluent, but you can dance to it.

Music is the soundtrack to my soul.

I get lost in the music and forget where I am.

Music is the only thing that will not let me sleep.

If music is the air that I breathe, then you’re the oxygen I need to keep it alive.

I'm the girl who has all the music and no life.

The best way to spend your weekend is listening to some of the best music ever made.

Music is the only thing that defines me.

Life is a song we all need to sing- it's up to us what key we choose.

Music is the soundtrack that accompanies your life.

I'm a music lover who doesn't do anything by he rules.

If you’re a music lover like me, then you will quickly fall in love with this new playlist.

4-Step Guide: How To Create The Perfect Instagram Bio For Your Business

Instagram gives you 150 characters to tell your followers what your business is about.

This is where you are given the opportunity to summarize your company, engage your audience, and leave a great first impression.

We will break down the qualities and aspects of Later's Instagram bio, as a template for you to use.

Step 1: Highlight Exactly What You Do

Your Instagram bio should be a place where you tell your readers exactly who you are.

This should be brief, clear, and to the point. Explain what makes you unique and what you can do for your audience.

In the Later example, they do this in two different ways:

In their profile name, they showcase their company name with a clear description of what they do

They provide even more explanation and boost their brand up, saying they are the #1 marketing platform for Instagram

Step 2: Pitch Your Service [And Use Relevant Keywords]

While it's important to explain what type of company you are, it's also critical to pitch your product or service.

When creating a website, this is often the first thing people see on your site to really understand what you are offering and what makes you stand out from the rest.

Later does this using one line on their bio, and 8 relevant keywords:

Step 3: Provide A Clear Call To Action

Your call to action should be something you are encouraging your audience to do.

This could be in the form of a recent promotion you are offering, a link to a specific article you want eyes on, or just a way for users to get directed to your website.

In any case, you should always provide the user with easy access to whatever it is you'd like them to do. You can do this by providing a direct, embedded link on your bio.

For the Later example, they encourage users to check out their blog where they showcase tips and guides. This is a common strategy that brands use to get more traffic to their blog, and eventually, turn leads into customers.

Step 4: Use Emojis

Lastly, emojis are a great way to break up any text-heavy sections in your Instagram bio.

Be sure to use emojis that are relevant to your brand or to highlight the items you are discussing in your bio.

Later adds emojis to draw the readers eyes to certain aspects of their bio, such as what they do and their call to action:

meet the author

Pat Walls

I'm Pat Walls and I created Starter Story - a website dedicated to helping people start businesses. We interview entrepreneurs from around the world about how they started and grew their businesses.
